channel.title: I've been writing weekly about my SaaS
channel.description:
I don't think I've posted about this here yet. For the last few months I've been writing each week about what's happened with my SaaS this week.
- First post: http://www.jasonswett.net/weekly-snip-report-january-17th-2014/ - Most recent post: http://www.jasonswett.net/weekly-snip-report-april-11th-2014/
I've been told by some people they find my posts interesting, so hopefully they are.
